resources.string: Here is some info about the app
Use credentials of that of a sync account from below:
Scan a QR Code containing AWS credentials
Sign in to your S3 account

In order to generate a QR Code, choose any available QR code generator and select the data type as Text or Plain Text.\n\nEnter AWS access key and secret key separated by a new line and generate the code (see example below).
Press the scan button below when you are ready.
In order to read AWS credentials from a file on SD Card, create a file and enter AWS access key and secret key separated by a new line and save the file (see example below).
Press the button below to choose the file from SD Card.
Secure sync provider for Android. Secure sync provider for Android. Secure sync provider for Android
You do not have any accounts set up. Choose an account type below to Sync contacts.
